title: Vue 3 Carousel - MasterControl
description: This project was one of the main projects I worked on at MasterControl. This project started as a request to add a carousel with some speakers to the home page for an upcoming event. I got an opportunity to simply build a feature that met the specifications with no restrictions on how I did it. Since vue was already a familiar tool, I decided to go with Vue's carousel.
name: https://www.mastercontrol.com/events/summit/2023/home/

title: Speaker API Integration - MasterControl
description: This was another addition I made to the events page at MasterControl. This feature displays dynamic cards with speaker information as it comes in from a constantly-updating API.
name: https://www.mastercontrol.com/events/summit/2023/agenda/

title: Chronos - Mtec
description: This project is a timesheet app built with angular. it tracks employee timecards across each week and displays this data dynamically grouped by individuals or departments.
name: https://keltonlee7536.github.io/Chronos/departments

title: speed-n-power, LLC
description: This project is a buisness website made with vue 3. In making this website I got to experience development with a small buisness and using some interesting new features like integrating google forms into the webpage.
name: https://keltonlee7536.github.io/speed-n-power/
